docs.snippet: Cam Newton has not missed a game since arriving in the N.F.L. but he has been dogged by a sore left ankle since the end of last season....
docs.lead_paragraph: Cam Newton has not missed a game since arriving in the N.F.L. but he has been dogged by a sore left ankle since the end of last season.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; Mario Manningham, one of New York Giants' most productive receivers from 2008 to 2011, will rejoin team; other football news noted.

headline.main: Panthers’ Newton Will Have Ankle Surgery
headline.print_headline: Manningham, a Super Bowl Hero, Rejoins the Giants

docs.snippet: A friend who rescued Indiana wide receiver Isaac Griffith as he was drowning said that he just acted on instinct when the pair and two other friends were caught in a rip current....
docs.lead_paragraph: A friend who rescued Indiana wide receiver Isaac Griffith as he was drowning said that he just acted on instinct when the pair and two other friends were caught in a rip current.

docs.snippet: The U.S. Patent and Trademark Office has rejected another product with "Redskin" in the name, the latest sign that it might rule against the Washington Redskins in an ongoing trademark case....

docs.snippet: A woman at the center of a sexual assault case against a former Naval Academy football player asked a second player for sex on the night when she was allegedly assaulted, and she didn't care that he didn't have a condom, that player testified Wedn...
docs.lead_paragraph: A woman at the center of a sexual assault case against a former Naval Academy football player asked a second player for sex on the night when she was allegedly assaulted, and she didn't care that he didn't have a condom, that player testified Wednesday.

headline.main: Naval Academy Sex Assault Case Wrapping Up

docs.snippet: Arizona will not seek to extradite former standout professional football player Darren Sharper from California to face rape and drugging charges involving two women as a similar case against him in Los Angeles proceeds, prosecutors said on Wednesd...
docs.lead_paragraph: Arizona will not seek to extradite former standout professional football player Darren Sharper from California to face rape and drugging charges involving two women as a similar case against him in Los Angeles proceeds, prosecutors said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Arizona Not Seeking Ex-NFL Player's Extradition in Rape Case, for Now
headline.print_headline: Arizona Not Seeking Ex-NFL Player's Extradition in Rape Case, for Now
